Articles.Content:
Stock and modded aircraft for all your dog-fighting, transporting and fire-catching needs!!

From world war 2 era bush plane to the sixth generation jet fighter, I built anything that flies, be sure to get B9 Aerospace mod and Firespitter mod, I use them often.
Please post pics, it is better explained trough pics.
You can't post a thread just talking about how awesome you design is and what you used.
